This page contains samples of a lot of art I've created, like drawings, videos, and music!

Silvauria: Warrior Princess

In the Fall of 2024, I led a development team to create a game in RPG Maker XP in just a couple months. It's still under progress, and the development cycle is unforgiving at times, but it's been lots of fun!
It's my job to implement all of the assets, as well as write the game, but I create some assets myself as well! I designed the games primary antagonist, the Obsidian King. To fit into the games themes, we wanted him to have crow-like details. That's why he has those claw-like limbs and that beak-like maw.
I also created the battle sprites for the character. It's interesting working on a game like this, as many of the assets you make have to fit extremely specific measurements!

One thing that I actually quite like to do is to mess around with 3D shapes in Adobe Illustrator.
I'm a big fan of how the final image looks, it's an almost nostalgic style to me.

My favorite part of making videos might just be making the thumbnails.
It's really fun to try to entice the imaginary viewer with hints of what the video holds.

One of my favorite hobbies that I regretably don't dedicate much time to is making music.
I like to make video game-esque music using the online software at Bandlab.com or Soundtrap.com
I'm also the composer for Silvauria: Warrior Princess, writing all the game's music and handling its sound design. Here's some samples from the soundtrack:
Greed as Black as Coal, the Obsidian King's theme:

Lord of Sand, the theme of another antagonist:

Silver Clash, the game's main battle theme:
